title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Maggie Lena Walker and Pepper's Ghost
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Maggie Lena Walker and Pepper's Ghost
description:
Tracy and Holly discuss the possible inspiration for Maggie Lena Walker's name, and then discuss favorite recipes as inspired by a listener mail. They also speculate on Pepper's personality, and how he opened up education to a wide audience.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
